runs.comm: short of a length outside off stump, Tamim throws his bat at it and gets beaten by the slightly higher bounce
that's a bit too wide outside off stump, Tamim chases and can't connect
tight line and length just outside off, left alone by the batsman
short of a length and straight, played off the hips behind square
short and wide outside off stump, Kayes gets going by hitting the ball in the air over cover point
that one took off sharply from short of a length, Kayes began to play at it outside off but then pulled his bat out of the way
defended from the crease towards the off side
short of a length outside off, Tamim tries to run it to third man but gets beaten
played to third man for one
short of a length just outside off, the batsman plays inside the line and the ball passes the outside edge
full ball down leg side, that's a wide
short of a length outside off, defended on the back foot towards the off side
shot! Kayes charges the bowler, picks up the length superbly and lofts through the line, clearing the long-off boundary comfortably
this one rises a bit more outside off, Kayes fends and is beaten
nudged off the pads to short fine leg
lovely timing, slightly wide outside off and Tamim punches the ball smoothly off the front foot through the gap at cover
short ball on leg stump, Tamim swivels and pulls the ball to the fine leg boundary, he didn't connect all that well, but the placement was good
defended on the back foot towards point
pushed towards cover
played with soft hands towards the off side for a quick single
length ball angling across the left-hander, pushed from the crease towards cover
played off the front foot towards backward point
caught behind! Tamim barely moves his feet as he flashes away from his body at a length ball that angles across him. He was looking to hit through cover point but edged it to Ramdin
played off the pads towards the leg side

length ball wide outside off stump, Kayes drives fluently through cover and Darren Bravo gives chase. He's an ordinary fielder but this time he does well to slide and pull it back. The ball hits his arm again though and goes over the rope
left alone outside off stump
Ashraful takes a small step forward and then lofts a length ball right back over the bowler's head. He's hit that superbly
played with an open face towards backward point
too straight, flicked off the pads to deep square leg
the slower ball is down leg side, it's called wide
another slower ball, straighter this time, nudged off the pads towards midwicket
played with soft hands towards cover
Kayes plays the pull too early and gets hit on the upper arm, the ball goes past the keeper towards third man
played off the pads to square leg
short ball and Kayes pulls the ball firmly to the square leg boundary
short once again, Kayes moves back and punches the ball to long-on
Ashraful moves across and tries to paddle the ball, he doesn't make proper contact and the fielder at short fine leg intercepts
played back to the bowler
played from the crease towards point
played off the pads to fine leg
played to deep point for a single
beaten outside the off stump
chipped over the bowler's head towards long-on, a bit of a leading edge
tight line on middle stump, Ashraful stays in his crease and plays back to the bowler
driven off the back foot to long-on
driven from the crease through cover
slightly shorter outside off stump, Ashraful slog sweeps towards deep square leg
Kayes plays too early and gets a bit of a leading edge that falls short of Martin

well caught at deep backward square leg! Kayes hit the slog sweep hard and flat towards Danza Hyatt, who positioned himself a few feet inside the boundary and took the catch at head height. He fell over after taking it but remained inside play
bowled him. Shakib's gone first ball and Mirpur goes quiet. He went back to defend and a good length ball skidded on him and went through the bat-pad gap
defended back to the bowler
pushed towards cover point
Kapali reaches out and defends on the front foot
flicked off the pads to midwicket
Kapali pushes forward to defend on the off but gets an inside edge behind square on the leg
short of a length angling into the right-hander, the batsman moves across and plays it down on the leg side
Brathwaite has a chest-on action and delivers another short of a length delivery, the batsman moves back and plays behind square leg
another short of a length ball and Kapali fends rather helplessly, closing the face to play on the leg side. The ball hits the leading edge and lobs safely on the off side
played to cover, the length was fuller this time

that's his first wicket in international cricket! Brathwaite bowled a short of a length ball outside off, Kapali just swung at it and ended up hitting it high in the air over point. Martin ran back and judged the catch well as the ball came over his head
short and wide outside off stump, Ashraful cuts towards the fielder on the cover-point boundary
driven through cover for a single
nudged off the pads towards midwicket. Pressure mounting.
driven off the front foot to long-on
that's deft. Mushfiqur moves across his stumps and scoops the ball towards fine leg
this time he tries to drive down the ground and gets a bit of an edge to cover
shorter length outside off stump, cut off the back foot to deep backward point
he tries to pull one that isn't short enough and mis-times to midwicket
full ball outside off stump, driven off the front foot to deep cover
short of a length outside the off stump, the batsman stays on the back foot and opens the face to guide towards third man
length ball on off and middle, the batsman pulls to midwicket
width offered outside off stump, cut hard into the gap on the point boundary
pulled off the back foot over midwicket
slower ball on off stump, driven to long-on
full ball outside off, the batsman makes room and lofts over extra cover. The fielder at long-off runs to his left and fields
bowled him! Sammy looped in a slower ball on off stump, the batsman made room by moving towards the leg side to hit through the off. He swung too early and lost off stump

slower ball on middle and leg stump, the batsman dabs towards the leg side and sets off. There's a huge gap at midwicket and so Sammy has to run to the edge of the circle to field. He picks up and throws at the keeper's end, Nasir dived and was just safe
played towards point
Sammy loses grip on the ball and bowls a high full toss wide outside off stump, that's off the pitch
pushed off the front foot towards cover
nudged off the back foot towards midwicket
short of a length delivery, pulled from the crease towards long-on
Nasir Hossain swings hard and across the line, hitting the ball along the ground towards deep midwicket where a sliding save saved the boundary
dropped by Bravo, whose fielding is quite abysmal. Hossain mis-cued a pull over the bowler's head. Bravo came running in from mid-off, got to it, but shelled it.
short ball, the batsman tries to pull and the top edge goes to fine leg
played towards long-on
good length and straight, it was the slower ball. The batsman played it with soft hands on off side and ran
another slower ball, Mushfiqur tried to slog-sweep but missed and got hit on the body
driven to long-on for a single
full ball in the blockhole, played through midwicket
another slower ball outside off stump, played from the crease towards cover point
little Mushfiq needs to do more than drive along the ground to long-on for two
short of a length outside off, cut to deep backward point where a fumble from the fielder allows the second
he's found the gap! It was a length ball and Nasir swung hard, sending the ball into the gap between long-on and deep midwicket
slower ball on off and middle, pushed towards the off side for a single
Mushiq! Terrific presence of mind. The third man was in the circle and Mushfiqur cut the ball even though it was close to him through the gap between the keeper and short third man
short ball, Mushfiqur hits it with a flat bat past the bowler and sprints back for the second

slower ball on off stump, nudged to midwicket for a single. Mushfiqur will keep strike for the final over. Spare a though for the debutant though. Brathwaite's gone for 14 in an over that could be a game-breaker.
a low full toss and Mushfiqur plays it straight to the fielder at short midwicket. Lucky dot ball for West Indies
another full toss, this time Mushfiqur hits it past the fielder in the circle to the man at deep midwicket
caught behind! Nasir, what are you doing? Instead of giving the strike back to his captain, Nasir backs away and tries to smash through the off side, he gets a nick through to Ramdin.
Razzak tries to swing a full ball through midwicket but mis-hits it on to his pad, they run a single towards cover

six, six! Mushfiqur slams a length ball over the deep midwicket boundary and Mirpur erupts. What a tremendous way to win your first game as captain. He knew it was a six the moment he made contact, raising his arms in triumph and screaming.
